page.title: 07My family's week day
page.content: My family's day begins at 07:00 when we all get up and have breakfast.While we have a cup of tea my mother makes a packed lunch for my sister and me.My sister is 16 years old and has to leave the house early as her school bus leaves the village at 08:00 to take her to Madras College in St.Andrews 12 miles away.I still go to the village school so I can leave home at 8:40.My mum sets off at 8:00 on her moped for St.Andrews where she works. My father is an insurance agent and leaves by car for Dundee at 9:30.At 15:15 I arrive home from school and take our two dogs out for a walk.My dad arrives home at 15:00 but usually goes out to work again after tea,returning at 21:00.Both my mum and sister return home at 16:30.The rest of the day is for leisure and homework .We go to bed at about 21:00.
